source_question: 我如何改善自己跟他（她）的关系？

localizations.name: 情感-当前状态
localizations.description: 分析当前您与对方的关系中，双方的情感状态如何，是否存在误解或矛盾。
localizations.summary: 了解当前情感状态，为改善关系提供基础。

localizations.name: Relationship-communication style
localizations.description: Evaluate how you communicate with your partner, including listening skills and expressing emotions.
localizations.summary: Improving communication can enhance understanding and connection in the relationship.

localizations.name: 情感-潜在问题
localizations.description: 探索可能导致关系紧张或冲突的潜在情感问题，如信任、沟通等。
localizations.summary: 识别潜在问题，为解决关系中的障碍做准备。

localizations.name: Relationship-trust building
localizations.description: Focus on building trust through honesty, reliability, and transparency in your interactions.
localizations.summary: Trust is the foundation of a strong and lasting relationship.

localizations.name: 情感-改善策略
localizations.description: 提供具体的改善关系的方法和建议，如增进沟通、共同活动等。
localizations.summary: 制定改善关系的具体行动计划，促进双方关系的和谐发展。

localizations.name: Relationship-quality time
localizations.description: Allocate dedicated time for meaningful interactions, shared activities, and creating memories together.
localizations.summary: Spending quality time together strengthens the bond and fosters intimacy.

locales.question: 我如何改善自己跟他（她）的关系？
locales.overall_summary: 通过分析情感状态、识别潜在问题以及制定改善策略，全面审视并提升与对方的关系。

locales.question: How can I improve my relationship with him (her)?
locales.overall_summary: To improve your relationship with your partner, focus on enhancing communication, building trust, and spending quality time together. These aspects form the pillars of a healthy and fulfilling relationship.
